definition: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
surname Fang
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
surname Xing
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
to mow/to cut/to reap/to redress
surname Ai

sentences.english: At present, the study of IID is rising in domestic and foreign.
sentences.chinese: 目前，国内外对信息化教学设计的研究方兴未艾。

sentences.english: The study of carbon fiber cement-based composites is in the ascendant nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 碳纤维水泥基复合材料的研究方兴未艾。

sentences.english: Translation study in the field of comparative literature is on the upswing.
sentences.chinese: 翻译研究在当代比较文学研究中正呈现方兴未艾之势。

sentences.english: There are piano performers and music lovers all over the world. Piano craze in our country is now in the ascendant.
sentences.chinese: 现在习琴爱乐者遍布全球，我国的钢琴热亦方兴未艾。

sentences.english: Rhubarb is a chinese herbal drug in common use. For many years, the research boost of rhubarb is in the ascendant.
sentences.chinese: 大黄为常用中药，多年来，对其研究热潮方兴未艾。

sentences.english: Another towel trend that is beginning to take hold is blends of wood fibers and cotton.
sentences.chinese: 另一的方兴未艾的毛巾趋势就是木纤维与绵的混纺。

sentences.english: Asia-Europe cooperation has just started. There is still a long way ahead.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧合作方兴未艾，任重道远。

sentences.english: The construction of city subsidiary-centres in China is in the ascendant.
sentences.chinese: 我国城市副中心建设方兴未艾。

sentences.english: From mid-18th century onwards, the enlightenment of Europe has continued all along.
sentences.chinese: 自十八世纪中期始，欧洲启蒙运动方兴未艾。

sentences.english: In a word, the development of the relay protection technology ascends rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 可以这么说，现在的继电保护技术发展方兴未艾。

definition: to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
to rise suddenly/to grow vigorously
to blossom everywhere/to spring up all over the place/to flourish on a large scale
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
to develop rapidly
with great prospects for the future (idiom); well worth doing
upsurge/popular craze
to come at the right time/to be opportune
wave/tides
a hundred flowers bloom (idiom); let the arts have free expression
spring tide/(fig.) momentous social change
vigorous expansion/rapid development
to surge like a gathering storm (idiom)/to grow by leaps and bounds
sunrise industry
to have a promising future/to have bright prospects
rampant/very popular
